700968f-a.title: Bronx: Eastchester Road - Boston Road
700968f-a.text:
Eastchester Road, south from Boston Road (left), to a point midway between Tillotson and Givan Aves. The two houses, in the center of the view, bear Nos. 3352 and 3350 (left to right). The view is in an easterly
direction from Corsa Ave.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
700968f-a.folder: Eastchester Road & Boston Road, Bronx, NY

700969f-a.title: Bronx: Eastchester Road - Boston Road
700969f-a.text:
Eastchester Road (on which houses are facing), adjcining (empty lot, right) and north of the N.E. corner of Boston Read. The 27-story frame house in the center of the view bears No. 3442. Adjoining it to the north is Engine 38 and Hook and Ladder 5l of the New York Fire Department.
The vantage point is Corsa Ave.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
700969f-a.folder: Eastchester Road & Boston Road, Bronx, NY

700970f-a.title: Bronx: Eastchester Road - Boston Road
700970f-a.text:
Eastchester Road, north from and including Boston Road, showing the
thoroughfare in the process of construction.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
700970f-a.folder: Eastchester Road & Boston Road, Bronx, NY

700550f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Eastchester Road
700550f-a.text:
Boston Road, south side, between Eastchester Road and Mickle
Avenue.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
700550f-a.folder: Boston Road & Eastchester Road, Bronx, NY

700549f-b.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Eastchester Road
700549f-b.text:
(1)
35Ol Boston Road, at the N.E. corner of Eastchester Road.' The inscription on the house readsl Bronx Reed and Rattan Co. The vhew is south from Corsa Avenue.
November 11, 1932
P.L.Sperr
(2)
The same house, at a later date.
June 16, 1938
P.L.Sperr
